alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jefferson; St. Charles; St. Louis; Warren (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 26 at 9:07PM CDT until September 26 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern St. Charles County in east central Missouri... Northwestern Jefferson County in east central Missouri... East central Franklin County in east central Missouri... West central St. Louis County in east central Missouri... Southeastern Warren County in east central Missouri... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 906 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Augusta, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wildwood, Washington, Eureka, Pacific, Gray Summit, Villa Ridge, Augusta, Defiance, Dutzow, Matson, and Catawissa. This includes Interstate 44 in Missouri between exits 251 and 261. This also includes Babler Memorial State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Franklin; Jefferson; St. Charles; St. Louis; Warren
